body_html:
Chatted with @ekelsen, and this timeout is reproducible with:
CUDA_CACHE_DISABLE=1 bazel test --test_env=CUDA_CACHE_DISABLE --nocache_test_results --config=cuda //tensorflow/python/kernel_tests:map_stage_op_test

Setting the test size to large and merging for now. If you have cycles, might be worth reducing the JIT compilation time in the test.

body:
Chatted with @ekelsen, and this timeout is reproducible with:
`CUDA_CACHE_DISABLE=1 bazel test --test_env=CUDA_CACHE_DISABLE --nocache_test_results --config=cuda //tensorflow/python/kernel_tests:map_stage_op_test`

Setting the test size to large and merging for now. If you have cycles, might be worth reducing the JIT compilation time in the test.
